item.description:
Dear All,


On July 4th, you're invited to come out to the annual anti-imperialist picnic/BBQ. There will be drinks, food and games by the beautiful Charles River. Feel free to bring a dish or beverage to share. The location will be the same as last year: right next to the the Charles River Canoe and Kayak. Here is a map and directions (look for the red and
black flags!):

http://www.paddleboston.com/boston/directions.php

11am til the fireworks start.
3:30pm pick-up football game

For many years Boston radicals have come out to the banks of the Charles on this day to band together to denounce the spectacle of July 4th.

On the 4th of July, people forget about the brutal wars the USA is waging and has waged around the world. They are lulled into a nationalistic, delusional view that this country is better than all the rest; more free than the rest; the model the rest of the world should follow.

Don't sit back and take part in their spectacle. Come together to build a stronger community to fight against oppression and imperialism!

Fuck July 4th! Power to the people!

A special thanks goes out to the IWW local for donating money to help this event happen.

In struggle,

Boston Anti-Imperialists
